Call of Duty Black Ops II

TO ANYONE WHO TRIED EVERYTHING BUT STILL COULDNT GET IT TO WORK (UPDATE CRACK, CHANGE TIMEZONE AND DATE TO 13TH 14TH ETC....) YOU GOTTA UPDATE YOUR WINDOWS. I BELIEVE MOST OF US ARE USING PRIVATED WINDOWS 7 SO ITS NOT GONNA AUTOMATICLY UPDATE ITSELF. IN THAT CASE, YOU GO TO "START" BUTTON, CLICK ON SEARCH AND TYPE "UPDATE", THEN CLICK ON "WINDOWS UPDATE" AND LET IT DO ITS JOB, AFTER THAT, LET YOUR COMPUTER DO A REBOOT. BEFORE YOU TRY TO RUN THE GAME, YOU MIGHT WANT TO CHANGE THE DATE BACK TO THE 14TH AND TIMEZONE +8:00 (JUST IN CASE)...NOW YOU SHOULD BE ABLE TO PLAY THE GAME. ENJOY :D
Works! Good job man. Even though the date/time problem was small it was annoying as hell haha.

Finally got this to work, windows 8 x64. Go to: C:Program Files (x86)ActivisionCall of Duty Black Ops IIredistDirectXDXSETUP.exe

Run and install. Set the date and time to the 14th Nov, +8 hong kong.

Run the game.

Alternatively use this crack with the game and all is good!

Game is working fine so far! No black screen or crashing.

Had to tack on a .RAR extension on the downloaded file.  It works great though!  Thank you!

The whole point of this crack is that you don't have to adjust your time zone.

Just use the crack that comes with the Skidrow release first, then copy and paste this crack to the same install directory of the game itself, click yes to all when you unzip the file and your good to go.

No time zone adjustment is needed from then on.
